trans-unit.target:
The Cosmic Exploration Initiative has officially completed its operations in Sinus Ardorum!
Thanks to the hard work and diligence of contributors like you, we are ready to leap from our Lunar Hopopolis to frontiers unknown. 'Tis a dream come true!
We hope you will join us as we continue to seek delightful new discoveries on distant stars.
Sincerely, The Loporrits

The Cosmic Exploration Initiative has officially completed its operations on Phaenna!
The Phaenna Stellascope, a monument to the hard work of our countless contributors, now turns its glassy gaze to the sea of stars.
Its observations will no doubt propel us to yet more wonder and discovery, which we hope to share with you before long.
Sincerely, The Loporrits
